posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
It's not a bad idea but we need to see a more complete build in this subforum. Concepts are better addressed in the Build Request subforum.

Please post only properly-formatted, complete and tested builds in the Builds section. Avoid including any item enhancements as it can't be evaluated and compared with other ECB builds. Otherwise, there is little guild members can do to help you improve your build. You can use a tool like Kamiryn's CBC using the halfling race and make the appropriate adjustments to the output to reflect the custom race(s) available on Arelith. You must have Excel loaded on your machine to use it, however. If not, you will need to generate the Level-up guide, Skill allocation and final AB/AC/saves/HPs manually... very tedious.

All the best in your building ventures and Welcome to the new Epic Character Builders Guild!
